channel.title: World
channel.description: The Washington Post World section provides information and analysis of breaking world news stories. In addition to our world news and video, Post World News offers discussions and blogs on major international news and economic issues.

item.title: Earth’s wildlife populations have disappeared at a ‘catastrophic’ rate in the past half-century, new analysis says
item.dc:creator: Frances Vinall, Allyson Chiu
item.description: The Living Planet Index tracks thousands of vertebrate species globally and found the worst declines were in Latin America and the Caribbean.
